 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָצַץ‎</span>] **verb** ==crush== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bruise, bray, crush***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְעַ‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***crush, shatter***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַצּוֺתָנוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.12.4|1Sam 12:4]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַצּוֺתִי‎</span> v[[1Sam.12.3|1Sam 12:3]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָּרוּץ‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67q»§ 67q</sup>) [[Isa.42.4|Isa 42:4]] (Babylonian Manuscript <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵרוֺץ‎</span>, Niph\`al, so [[BDB#SS|SS]] here and [[Eccl.12.6|Eccl 12:6]]a), 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּרוּץ‎</span> [[Eccl.12.6|Eccl 12:6]]a, 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָרֻץ‎</span> [[Ps.18.30|Ps 18:30]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָרוּץ‎</span> [[2Sam.22.30|2Sam 22:30]] (see below); ***Participle active*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹצְצוֺת‎</span> [[Amos.4.1|Amos 4:1]] ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָצוּץ‎</span> [[Isa.42.3|Isa 42:3]] +, construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְצוּץ‎</span> [[Hos.5.11|Hos 5:11]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְצוּצִים‎</span> [[Isa.58.6|Isa 58:6]] — ***crush:*** 

**1.** literal, 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***passive participle*** in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(הַ)קָּנֶה (הָ)רָצוּץ‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.21|2Kgs 18:21]] = [[Isa.36.6|Isa 36:6]]; [[Isa.42.3|Isa 42:3]] (all metaphor of weak person). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** imperfect intransitive ***get crushed*** (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּרוֺץ‎</span>?), of bowl [[Eccl.12.6|Eccl 12:6]]a (in metaphor). 

**2.** figurative ***crush, oppress***, accusative of person [[1Sam.12.3|1Sam 12:3]]; [[1Sam.12.4|1Sam 12:4]]; [[Amos.4.1|Amos 4:1]] passive participle [[Deut.28.33|Deut 28:33]], as substantive ***the oppressed*** [[Isa.58.6|Isa 58:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְצוּץ מִשְׁפָּט‎</span> [[Hos.5.11|Hos 5:11]] ([[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹצֵץ‎</span>, i.e. ***perverting judgment***, but dubious); intransitive ***get crushed*** (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵרוֺץ‎</span>?), of servant of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, under figure of wick, [[Isa.42.4|Isa 42:4]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכְהֶה‎</span>) he shall not grow dim or ***be crushed out.*** **Niph\`al** ***be crushed, broken: Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְרֹץ‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67t»§ 67t</sup>) [[Eccl.12.6|Eccl 12:6]]b (of wheel at cistern); ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּרוֺץ‎</span> [[Ezek.29.7|Ezek 29:7]] (of Pharaoh as reed, compare **Qal 1 a**); [[Job.20.10|Job 20:10]] read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵרֹצּוּ‎</span> (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרַצּוּ‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רצה‎</span> Pi\`el), ***are crushed*** (as) poor men, [[BDB#Bu|Bu]], compare [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]] [[BDB#SS|SS]] [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]. — [[Isa.42.2|Isa 42:2]]; [[Eccl.12.6|Eccl 12:6]] a see **Qal. Pi\`el** ***crush in pieces:*** 

**1.** literal (in metaphor) ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִצַּצְתָּ‎</span> [[Ps.74.14|Ps 74:14]] with accusative of thing. 

**2.** figurative = ***grievously oppress***, 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִצַּץ‎</span> [[Job.20.19|Job 20:19]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְרַצֵּץ מִן הָעָם‎</span> [[2Chr.16.10|2Chr 16:10]]. **Po\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְרֹצְצוּ‎</span> [[Judg.10.8|Judg 10:8]], accusative of person (= **Pi\`el 2**; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעץ‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רצץ‎</span> here perhaps doublet, so [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]<sup>Hpt</sup>, compare [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּ֫רִץ‎</span> ([[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 352</sup>; [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xliii (1889), 181</sup> thinks **Qal**) [[Judg.9.53|Judg 9:53]] ***she crushed his skull.*** **Hithpo\`el** reciprocal, ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וִיִּתְרֹצְצוּ הַבָּנִים בְּקִרְבָּהּ‎</span> [[Gen.25.22|Gen 25:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***the children crushed*** (thurst, struck) ***one another within her.***
